subject: Olympic Games (2022)
Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The executives trying to bring the 2022 Winter Olympics to Almaty say their bid is better than Beijing’s, but winning July’s I.O.C. vote will be another matter.
snippet: The executives trying to bring the 2022 Winter Olympics to Almaty say their bid is better than Beijing’s, but winning July’s I.O.C. vote will be another matter.
